mapper.select: SELECT REVIEWBOARD_NO, REVIEWBOARD_NAME,REVIEWBOARD_TITLE, REVIEWBOARD_CONTENT, REVIEWBOARD_DATE,CLASS_NAME, REVIEWBOARD_TE, REVIEWBOARD_STAR FROM REVIEWBOARD ORDER BY REVIEWBOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWBOARD VALUES(REVIEWBOARD_SEQ,#{reveiwboard_name, reveiwboard_title, reveiwboard_content, class_name, reveiwboard_te,reveiwboard_star)
